content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to try out these techniques. Remember, experimentation is key to finding what works best for you and your artistic style. Don't be afraid to try new things, make mistakes, and learn from them.

Ink and paint can be a wonderful combination, and I'm sure you'll discover some amazing effects with palette knives. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask.

Most importantly, have fun and enjoy the process of creating!
